desc: You love us for our sweets but we are so much more than a sweet bite. We offer appetizers to desserts, boxed lunches to fine dining. We are the whole package. Contact us to cater your next event. Order our salads, sandwiches, dinners and dessert online for next day pick up from 510 Pioneer Street in Ridgefield, WA!

layout.text: Explosive Flavors from Appetizers to Desserts
We do really love desserts though!
